post_detail.title: Vine v. Instagram Video
post_detail.description:
As we launch our first full Vine campaign Elements of Everyday Life for AT&T and BBDO, we really had to confront the incredibly rapid emergence of Instagram video, variously called Vinstagram or Vid-Instagram etc.

2 articles appeared. The first one from Marketing Land showed what purported to be a dramatic drop in Vine following the Instagram announcement. The second one from All Things D largely debunked this, while remaining ambivalent over the actual winner in this war.

Our view is that Twitter owns Vine and Instagram is owned by Facebook. There's a place for both and we certainly need to be fully conversant in both applications. Of course, given our expertise in numerous Instagram apps we've built, we love having an API. Can Twitter/Vine be far behind?

Written By Peter Corbett on July 2, 2013.
